name: Avg Monthly Inventory Consumption Quantity
description: This measure is the monthly average quantity of inventory consumption. For example, if the user wants the last 12-month usage, this measure is the average of all the months in that period.
expression: Var StartDate = CALCULATE(MIN('Inventory Consumption'[Posting Date]), ALL(Plant[Plant]), ALL('Material Master'[Material Number]),ALL('Material Master'[Material Description]))
Var EndDate = CALCULATE(MAX('Inventory Consumption'[Posting Date]), ALL(Plant[Plant]), ALL('Material Master'[Material Number]),ALL('Material Master'[Material Description]))
